import React from 'react' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import ProductView from './ProductView' import Button from './Button' import { remove } from '../redux/product-modal/productModalSlice' import productData from '../assets/fake-data/products' const ProductViewModal = () => { const product = productData.getProductBySlug('quan-jean-phong-cach-18') return (
) } export default ProductViewModal
